property.name: text
property.value: The AircraftSAct Model provides the vertical velocity w and the pitch rate q. The Angle of Attack alpha and the pitch rate q as well as the stick pitch command sent by the pilot are used by the AutoPilotDE (controller) to command the Elevator Deflector of the aircraft. The sensors and the actuator are represented in the AircraftSAct model.

property.name: text
property.value: alphaS = sampled (w/U0) qS = sampled w Nz is just used for indicate the pilot G force. Outputs q and alpha(AoA) are the continuous variables before sampling, used for plotting.

property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Gilles Lasnier - SUPAERO ISAE - gilles.lasnier@gmail.com Janette Cardoso - SUPAERO ISAE - janette.cardoso@isae.fr Pierre Siron - SUPAERO ISAE / ONERA - pierre.siron@isae.fr

display.name: Name of the parameter to receive

property.name: text
property.value:
This model is based on the F-14 Longitudinal Flight Control model (f14.mdl) from Matlab. The composite actorPilotGForce uses the d/dt actor (derivative).
The pilot g force indicates the stresses on the aircraft (that can be destructive).

property.name: text
property.value: The sensors and actuator are considered at the plant. They send and receive digital signals.
